DPRK Ambassador to Mongolia Appointed 
    Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Pak Jong Do has been appointed as DPRK ambassador e. p. to Mongolia, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.content:
Congratulations to Singaporean Foreign Minister 
    Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a congratulatory message to George Yong-Boon Yeo upon his appointment as foreign minister of the Republic of Singapore.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop favorably, the message wished him success at his new post.

articles.content:
Film Show on Centenary of Deng Xiaoping's Birth
    Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and the Central Committee of the Korea-China Friendship Association arranged a film show at the Chollima House of Culture on August 19 on the occasion of the centenary of the birth of Deng Xiaoping.  Present there on invitation were Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Wu Donghe and his embassy officials.
 On hand were Mun Jae Chol, acting chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Kim Yong Il, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Jo Chan Gu, vice-minister of Culture, Ju Hwa Il, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Journalists Union and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Korea-China Friendship Association, and other officials concerned and working people in the city.    
 They appreciated the Korean documentary film "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung Meets with Heads of State and Prominent Figures of Foreign Countries"(Part 2). The film deals with immortal feats performed by Kim Il Sung in developing friendly relations among countries and accomplishing the cause of global independence through his energetic external activities, meeting with Deng Xiaoping and other Chinese leaders and party and state leaders and prominent figures of many countries.
